messages.message: btw just following up on this, the table will look like this with this change - wdyt? @Natasha
those buttons would appear only when the batch is outdated with that ! icon right?

i thought it’s possible the user wants to re-run the batch even if the app hasn’t changed, but i may be wrong

i can change the table to just show the button when the batch is outdated, to keep the UI cleaner

• if a job is outdated, we should 
show the rerun button (regardless of status)
• if a job is successful and not outdated, we should not show 
any button 
• if a job fails and is not outdated, we should show a button. should that say “retry” or “rerun”?
Let’s say rerun to be consistent
